snippet: Mark Teixeira is receiving daily treatment on his right wrist to try to return to the form of his first four seasons as a Yankee, when he averaged 34 home runs and 106 runs batted in.
abstract: New York Yankees first baseman Mark Teixeira is receiving daily treatment on his right wrist to try to return to the form of his first four seasons as a Yankee, when he averaged 34 home runs and 106 runs batted in.
lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeira is receiving daily treatment on his right wrist to try to return to the form of his first four seasons as a Yankee, when he averaged 34 home runs and 106 runs batted in.

headline.main: Teixeira Hopes Recovery Is All a Matter of Routine
headline.print_headline: Teixeira Hopes Recovery Is All a Matter of Routine
